{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

If a soft stemmed plant is cut horizontally near the base of its stem with a sharp blade on early morning of a humid day, drops of solution ooze through cut stem.  This is due to_____________ .

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

guttation                                             

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:907"},{"text":"

 bleeding

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:908"},{"text":"

root pressure

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1093"},{"text":"

transpiration pull
